title: Ticket #3986: Can't request TCP updates for CONDOR_VIEW_HOST
description:
#1102 added support for forwarding ads to the view collector via TCP if the view collector was using CCB or a shared port, since UDP doesn't work in those cases. So you should be able to request forwarding via TCP using UPDATE_COLLECTOR_WITH_TCP or TCP_UPDATE_COLLECTORS. This is an easy fix to do.

Igor Sfiligoi is reporting problems with full UDP buffers and lost updates when using UDP between their tiers of collectors. He'd like to enable TCP updates to try to fix the problem.
